contact.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
contact.faq.q1.title: What is the minimum time in advance to book?
contact.faq.q1.answer: We recommend booking at least 2 hours in advance to ensure availability. For VIP and armored services, we suggest 24 hours in advance.
contact.faq.q2.title: Do prices include tolls and parking?
contact.faq.q2.answer: Yes, all our prices include tolls, parking and fees. The amount shown is final, with no hidden costs.
contact.faq.q3.title: Do you accept credit cards?
contact.faq.q3.answer: We accept all major credit and debit cards, as well as Pix and cash.
contact.faq.q4.title: Is it possible to cancel the booking?
contact.faq.q4.answer: Yes, cancellations are free up to 2 hours before the scheduled time. After that, we charge 50% of the total.

exec.cta.subtitle: Contact us and get a personalized quote for your preferred vehicle. Immediate availability with bilingual driver.
armored.cert.title: Level IIIA Certification
armored.cert.subtitle: Our armored fleet is Level IIIA certified, offering ballistic protection against handguns and submachine guns, including .44 Magnum and 9mm NATO. All vehicles undergo rigorous inspections and constant preventive maintenance.
armored.features.title: Security Features
armored.features.subtitle: All our armored vehicles offer maximum protection without compromising comfort and elegance.
armored.features.item.level.title: Level IIIA Armor
armored.features.item.level.text: Ballistic protection against handguns and submachine guns.
armored.features.item.glass.title: Ballistic Glass
armored.features.item.glass.text: Multi-layer glass with anti-bullet film and impact resistance.
armored.features.item.runflat.title: Run-Flat Tires
armored.features.item.runflat.text: Run-flat technology allowing driving after puncture.
armored.features.item.emergency.title: Emergency System
armored.features.item.emergency.text: Auxiliary battery system and silent alarm for critical situations.
armored.protocol.title: Security Protocol
armored.protocol.subtitle: Our drivers follow strict security protocols to ensure your protection in all situations.
armored.protocol.item.route.title: Route Planning
armored.protocol.item.route.text: Prior route analysis with safe alternatives and strategic support points.
armored.protocol.item.schedule.title: Flexible Schedules
armored.protocol.item.schedule.text: Departures at varied times to avoid predictable travel patterns.
armored.protocol.item.communication.text: Real-time monitoring with support team ready to intervene.
armored.cards.toyota.title: Armored Toyota Fortuner
armored.cards.toyota.text: Armored SUV with maximum safety and comfort.
armored.cards.ford.title: Armored Ford Ranger
armored.cards.ford.text: Armored pickup with total protection and robustness.
armored.cards.chevrolet.title: Armored Chevrolet S10
armored.cards.chevrolet.text: Reliable armored pickup with excellent cost-benefit.
armored.cards.pajero.title: Armored Mitsubishi Pajero
armored.cards.pajero.text: Armored SUV with off-road capability and ballistic protection.
armored.cards.jeep.title: Armored Jeep Gladiator
armored.cards.jeep.text: Robust armored pickup with Jeep DNA and exceptional protection.
armored.cards.defender.title: Armored Land Rover Defender
armored.cards.defender.text: British armored SUV with iconic design and premium protection.
armored.cta.title: Maximum Security for Your Trips
armored.cta.subtitle: Contact us for a personalized quote for our armored fleet. Free consulting to assess your security needs.
services.cards.airport.title: Airport Transfer
services.cards.airport.text: Personalized pickup at arrivals with name sign. Real-time flight monitoring, luggage assistance and VIP escort to the vehicle. 24/7 service at SDU and GIG airports.
services.cards.corporate.title: Corporate Transport
services.cards.corporate.text: Executive service for meetings, client visits, corporate events and executive transport. Full discretion and guaranteed punctuality with bilingual, uniformed drivers.
services.cards.events.title: Special Events
services.cards.events.text: VIP transport for weddings, graduations, birthdays, business dinners and special celebrations. Personalized decoration and full concierge service to make your moment even more special.
services.cards.city.title: VIP City Tour
services.cards.city.text: Personalized sightseeing tours through Rio’s most iconic spots. Bilingual driver-guide with deep city knowledge, exclusive routes and strategic stops.
services.cards.shopping.title: Shopping Tour
services.cards.shopping.text: VIP shopping experience at Rio’s best malls and outlets. Luggage transport, personal concierge and access to exclusive areas. Perfect for demanding tourists.
services.cards.business.title: Business Meetings
services.cards.business.text: Executive transport for business meetings with multiple stops. Full logistical support, optimized itinerary and backup vehicles for absolute punctuality.
services.features.title: Differentials of Our Services
services.features.subtitle: Features that make our services unique and ensure your complete satisfaction.
services.features.item.availability.text: Service available every day, 24 hours a day, including holidays.
services.features.item.bilingual.title: Bilingual Assistance
services.features.item.bilingual.text: Drivers fluent in Portuguese and English, prepared to receive international clients.
services.features.item.security.title: Guaranteed Safety
services.features.item.security.text: Vehicles with GPS tracking, trained drivers and full passenger insurance.
services.features.item.concierge.title: Concierge Service
services.features.item.concierge.text: Personalized attention with focus on the smallest details and anticipation of needs.
services.process.title: How It Works
services.process.subtitle: Simple and efficient process to ensure the best possible service.
services.process.step1.title: Contact
services.process.step1.text: Reach out via WhatsApp or form with your needs and preferences.
services.process.step2.title: Personalization
services.process.step2.text: We create a personalized plan with vehicle, route and specific services for you.
services.process.step3.title: Confirmation
services.process.step3.text: We confirm all details and schedules and send the confirmation with driver information.
services.process.step4.title: VIP Experience
services.process.step4.text: Enjoy a premium transport experience with total comfort and safety.
